simphony.util.messages

Class Log4jMessageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • simphony.util.messages.Log4jMessageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEventListener

    public class Log4jMessageListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageEventListener
    A MessageEventListener that forwards messages on to log4j.
    Author:
    Jerry Vos

      • messageReceived

        public void messageReceived(MessageEvent event)
        Sends a message to log4j with the event's level, message, and throwable (if it is not null).
        Specified by:
        messageReceived in interface MessageEventListener
        Parameters:
        event - a message event

      • loadDefaultSettings

        public static void loadDefaultSettings()
        Loads the default logging settings. This sets up a console logger and a rolling file logger, both allowing DEBUG messages and higher. The default settings are found in the properties file in this package with the name CONFIG_FILE_NAME.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
